title: Ep 321: Steebee & Jeremiah & the School of Shoulda, Coulda, Woulda (Scissor Bros x TigerBelly)
itunes:title: Ep 321: Steebee & Jeremiah & the School of Shoulda, Coulda, Woulda (Scissor Bros x TigerBelly)
description:
Steve's Brother might still have a shot at the Hall of Fame. The Sweeter Lee and Jeremiah visit Poway High. Khalyla cares if it's King Kong's birthday. We talk the Scissor Bros' influence, hairy coach knuckles, a Temple redemption story, and Amazon sex position compliments. "I don't care if it's King Kong's Birthday"
